text: Fairtex is a Thailand muay thai, boxing, mixed martial arts and clothing brand that was founded in Bangkok, Thailand in 1958. Fairtex won the Best MMA gloves Award at World MMA Awards in 2008 ==See also== *Fairtex Gym *List of fitness wear brands *List of companies of Thailand ==References== ==External links== * Category:1958 establishments in Thailand Category:Clothing companies established in 1958 Category:Clothing companies of Thailand
title: Fairtex
